function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of awareness about blockchain and its potential","Impact":"Inhibits adoption of blockchain-based solutions for COVID-19 impact management","Mitigation":"Increase education and awareness about blockchain technology and its uses beyond cryptocurrencies","Technologies":"Education and training programs, informational campaigns","People":"General public, decision-makers, stakeholders in COVID-19 management","Owner":"Educational institutions, government agencies, technology companies"},{"Description":"Technical challenges in scalability of blockchain-based platforms","Impact":"Inability to effectively use blockchain technology to address COVID-19 impact due to scalability constraints","Mitigation":"Research and development of highly scalable blockchain solutions, collaboration with experts in scalability","Technologies":"Scalable blockchain frameworks, collaboration platforms for experts","People":"Blockchain developers, technology experts, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Integration of blockchain applications with legacy systems","Impact":"Difficulty in consolidating various emerging and legacy technologies for COVID-19 impact management","Mitigation":"Development of integration solutions, collaboration between blockchain and legacy technology experts","Technologies":"Legacy system integration tools, interoperability frameworks","People":"IT professionals, technology integrators, system administrators","Owner":"Technology companies, IT service providers, government agencies"}]}
